pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī aññatarissā itthiyā kulūpikā hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:6.3: Atha kho sā itthī taṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:6.4: “handāyye, imaṃ saṅghāṇiṃ amukāya nāma itthiyā dehī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:6.6: “sacāhaṃ pattena ādāya gacchāmi vissaro me bhavissatī”ti paṭimuñcitvā agamāsi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:6.9: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo saṅghāṇiṃ dhāressanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:7.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:7.2: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:7.7: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī saṅghāṇiṃ dhāressati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:7.8: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:7.9: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:9.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
